generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings extending into the distance, flanked by buildings and vehicles.
- sidewalk: A paved sidewalk runs along the right side of the road, separated by a curb, and has a pedestrian walking on it.
- building: Multiple multi-story buildings line both sides of the street, featuring various architectural styles and windows.
- vegetation: Trees and greenery are visible in the background, atop a hill behind the buildings.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings, appearing partly cloudy.
- person: A person is visible walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the street.
- car: Several cars are parked along the left side of the road, including a red car and a black car.
- truck: A red vintage truck is prominently visible in the middle of the road, facing towards the camera.
